script.name: plugin.piracy.spaceflybeacon
script.description: Piracy: Spacefly Beacon: Attract Spaceflies to your ship

line.comment: * SPACEFLY BEACON -by- MISTER BEAR v1.15 Jan-2011
* Attract spaceflies into your cargo automatically, based upon ship position
* TODO: menu with statistics
* Load location quality strings and save player ship pointer
* Initialise spacefly variables
* Check requirements, initialise location quality, the marquee string
* [ACTIVE] Increment or reset marquee frame
* [INITIALISING] Reduce shields and increase progress bar in 4% increments
* Decrease shields to zero in 4% decrements
* Switch to [ACTIVE] mode when marquee frame == 100
* [EVERY 1500ms] Check the user hasn't toggled command off
* [EVERY 3000ms] Update location quality
* [EVERY RANDOM INTERVAL] Try and catch a spacefly or two
* P(Catching a Spacefly) = Location Quality
* Calculate 'catch size' and spawn some spaceflies near player
* Prevent 'catch size' exceeding free cargo bay volume

line.text: -> get free volume of cargo bay

line.comment: * Add spaceflies to cargo bay and increment caught total
* Redraw running total string and play a sound
* Choose a random wait period before trying again [2500ms to 5000ms]
* Update marquee bar and display status
* Display initialising progress bar
* Display
* UPDATE CURRENT STATUS STRING : Update the string showing number of flies caught
* PARAM : [int] iLocationQuality : percentage indicating number of spaceflies available here
* PARAM : [string] szLocationQuality : string equivilent of above
* PARAM : [int] iSpacefliesCaught : running total spaceflies caught so far
* RETURNS : [string] szCurrentStatus : RHS of marquee output string
* $szOutput = = sprintf: fmt='Debug: %s %s', $iLocationQuality, $szLocationQuality, null, null, null
* CALCULATE LOCATION QUALITY : Calculate the bias for finding spaceflies
* RETURNS : [int] iLocationQuality : percentage indicating number of spaceflies available at current location
* RETURNS : [int] szLocationQuality : string vesion of above
* Scan for closest asteroid within 5km
* LOCATION QUALITY = 70% of ASTEROID YIELD, EXCEPT FOR NVIDIUM
* BONUS: Uninhabited sector

line.var: $i == Argon OR $i == Boron OR $i == Teladi OR $i == Terran OR $i == Paranid

line.comment: * PENALTY: Split sector
* LIMIT to between 0 and 100
* Convert LOCATION QUALITY into string ID
* SPAWN SPACEFLIES : Choose whether to create new spaceflies or re-use existings ones
* To avoid flooding the area with spaceflies only create new ones 40% of the time
* If first spacefly is already dead, spawn another and remove it from the array
* SPAWN SPACEFLY OBJECT : Creates a new group of spaceflies at player`s location
* ENSURE REQUIREMENTS : Quit if player breaks requirements
* RETURNS : [string] szError [optional] : Error string
* check whether player has changed ship
* check whether player has toggled the command off
* Check various requirements
* Current Speed : "Spacefly Beacon is ineffective at such velocities"

line.text: -> get free volume of cargo bay

line.comment: * Cargo bay Space : "Not enough space in cargo hold for Spaceflies"
* Player ejected : "You must be on board to operate the Spacefly Beacon"
* Ship if Docked : "You cannot operate the Spacefly Beacon inside a station"
* Exit command if error string isn't null
* EXIT GRACEFULLY : Display error message (if any), kill the spaceflies and exit
* PARAM : [array] aSpaceflies : array of all spaceflies created
* PARAM : [string] szOutput [optional] : Error message to display
* Display empty string if there's no error to erase the marquee bar
* Destroy the created spaceflies
* Skip ones that no longer exist
* Yield every 25
* Exit command
* REMOVE MUTEX AND EXIT : Disable the mutex and exit gracefully

sval.val: Piracy: Spacefly Beacon: Attract Spaceflies to your ship
Beacon Active...
Initialising...
Spaceflies: %s Location: %s
SPACEFLY BEACON -by- MISTER BEAR v1.15 Jan-2011
Attract spaceflies into your cargo automatically, based upon ship position
TODO: menu with statistics
Load location quality strings and save player ship pointer
Initialise spacefly variables
Check requirements, initialise location quality, the marquee string
[ACTIVE] Increment or reset marquee frame
[INITIALISING] Reduce shields and increase progress bar in 4% increments
Decrease shields to zero in 4% decrements
Switch to [ACTIVE] mode when marquee frame == 100
[EVERY 1500ms] Check the user hasn't toggled command off
[EVERY 3000ms] Update location quality
[EVERY RANDOM INTERVAL] Try and catch a spacefly or two
P(Catching a Spacefly) = Location Quality
Calculate 'catch size' and spawn some spaceflies near player
Prevent 'catch size' exceeding free cargo bay volume
Add spaceflies to cargo bay and increment caught total
Redraw running total string and play a sound
Choose a random wait period before trying again [2500ms to 5000ms]
Update marquee bar and display status
Display initialising progress bar
UPDATE CURRENT STATUS STRING : Update the string showing number of flies caught
PARAM : [int] iLocationQuality : percentage indicating number of spaceflies available here
PARAM : [string] szLocationQuality : string equivilent of above
PARAM : [int] iSpacefliesCaught : running total spaceflies caught so far
RETURNS : [string] szCurrentStatus : RHS of marquee output string
Debug: %s %s
CALCULATE LOCATION QUALITY : Calculate the bias for finding spaceflies
RETURNS : [int] iLocationQuality : percentage indicating number of spaceflies available at current location
RETURNS : [int] szLocationQuality : string vesion of above
Scan for closest asteroid within 5km
LOCATION QUALITY = 70% of ASTEROID YIELD, EXCEPT FOR NVIDIUM
BONUS: Uninhabited sector
PENALTY: Split sector
LIMIT to between 0 and 100
Convert LOCATION QUALITY into string ID
SPAWN SPACEFLIES : Choose whether to create new spaceflies or re-use existings ones
To avoid flooding the area with spaceflies only create new ones 40% of the time
If first spacefly is already dead, spawn another and remove it from the array
SPAWN SPACEFLY OBJECT : Creates a new group of spaceflies at player`s location
ENSURE REQUIREMENTS : Quit if player breaks requirements
RETURNS : [string] szError [optional] : Error string
check whether player has changed ship
check whether player has toggled the command off
Check various requirements
Current Speed : "Spacefly Beacon is ineffective at such velocities"
Cargo bay Space : "Not enough space in cargo hold for Spaceflies"
Player ejected : "You must be on board to operate the Spacefly Beacon"
Ship if Docked : "You cannot operate the Spacefly Beacon inside a station"
Exit command if error string isn't null
EXIT GRACEFULLY : Display error message (if any), kill the spaceflies and exit
PARAM : [array] aSpaceflies : array of all spaceflies created
PARAM : [string] szOutput [optional] : Error message to display
Display empty string if there's no error to erase the marquee bar
Destroy the created spaceflies
Skip ones that no longer exist
Yield every 25
Exit command
REMOVE MUTEX AND EXIT : Disable the mutex and exit gracefully
